title: Installation issue: [augustus]
body:
Trying to build Augustus results in this error:

```bash
==> No patches needed for augustus
==> augustus: Executing phase: 'edit'
==> Error: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'auxprogs/checkTargetSortedness/Makefile'

/opt/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/augustus/package.py:56, in edit:
         53            'src/Makefile'
         54        ]
         55        for makefile in makefiles:
  >>     56            filter_file('gcc', spack_cc, makefile, string=True)
         57            filter_file('g++', spack_cxx, makefile, string=True)
         58
         59        with working_dir(join_path('auxprogs', 'filterBam', 'src')):

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-augustus-3.4.0-6hnknxih32spy4jv2gap5a2mqhvfxmdc/spack-build-out.txt
```
The complete build log is [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/pull/34/checks?check_run_id=2107518093) and the spack.yaml used for containerize is:

```yaml
spack:
  specs: ["augustus"]
  view: true
  container:
    os_packages:
      build:
        - python3-dev
      final:
        - ca-certificates
    strip: false
```
